name: Mass Impact: Battleground
description:
Mass Impact: Battleground is a unique game that allows you to fight in cars in the Battle Royale! Every battle takes place on the mysterious island of Impact City, where you and another 40 opponents will searching the coolest weapons and fight each other for the title of Champion! Match starts with a landing on the battleground and players have a minute before the safe zone on the island begins to shrink.

Explore the battleground, find out all the secrets of this mysterious island, find best weapons and become a winner in the Battle Royale!

A variety of weapons - machine guns, rocket launchers, freezing guns, all this will help you win the battle. Equipment is different in terms of quality, try to find the best!

A huge number of cars and skins! On each battleground you will have a unique car and you will always be different from rivals.

Perfect cartoon graphics will give you an unforgettable experience, and excellent optimization will allow you to play even on old smartphones!

Mass Impact: Battleground is not just a game. This is a Battle Royale!
